Title: Verify Forms-Based Authentication Welcome Screen Components
Step Expected: Application is configured for forms-based authentication
Application is configured for forms-based authentication

Welcome screen displays with username field, password field, Sign-in Log-in button, 'Forgot your password?' button, 'Sign in with Microsoft' button, device clearing message, 'Is this an Emergency?' button, and copyright text

Step Action: Enter a valid username in the username field
Enter the corresponding valid password in the password field

Step Expected: Application navigates to the patient intake screen (#118537)

Title: Verify Failed Authentication and Error Handling

Step Expected: Error message is displayed to the user

Step Action: Verify username and password fields are highlighted
Step Expected: Username and password fields are highlighted red with alert icon

Step Action: Click the 'x' button on the error message

Step Expected: Application navigates to the forgot/change password screen (#108770)
